snippet.title: In Blood Trailer
snippet.description:
In Blood is a gothic romance and lovecraftian visual novel. The Kickstarter campaign is live, and the demo is out to play on Steam and Itch.io!

Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/scribble-games/in-blood-a-visual-novel-game?ref=8fsmgt

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1116750/In_Blood/
Itch.io: https://scribbles.itch.io/inblood

Trailer made by: Kidd Bowyer

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/WafflesRtheBest
Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/JaimeScribbles

*** In Blood Credits: ***
Writer, Developer, Programmer: Jaime Scribbles
Production Manager, Editor, Voice Director: PMscenarios 
Character Artist: Illuminate001
GUI Artist: Sitraxis
Background Artist: Saleha Chowdhury
Illustrator: Meagan Trott and Scherville
Audio Director and Sound Designer: Tim Reichert 
Music: Antriksh Bali and Kyle Mesce 

Voice Actors
Brenton: Kevin K. Gomez
Karon: Kieran Flitton
Tristin: C. W. "Seedub" Brown
Seta: Abigail Turner
Nyarbalte: Bradley Gareth
Eris: Wes Haas
